SEARCH
Package controller

Class FileManagement

java.lang.Object
controller.FileManagement
public class FileManagement extends Object
The FileManagement class provides methods for importing and exporting client and ingredient data to and from various file formats, including XML and CSV.
Version:
0.1
Author:
DaniAndries

  • Method Details

    • importClient

      public static List<Client> importClient() throws IOException
      Imports client data from a specified text file. Each line in the file is split using various delimiters (semicolon, comma, or pipe) and parsed into Client objects.
      Returns:
      a list of imported Client objects
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while reading the file

    • clientToXml

      public static void clientToXml(List<Client> list) throws javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
      Exports a list of Client objects to an XML file using JAXB.
      Parameters:
      list - the list of Client objects to be exported
      Throws:
      javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - if an error occurs during the marshalling process

    • xmlToClient

      public static List<Client> xmlToClient() throws javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
      Imports client data from an XML file using JAXB.
      Returns:
      a list of Client objects imported from the XML file
      Throws:
      javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - if an error occurs during the unmarshalling process

    • ingredientToCsv

      public static void ingredientToCsv(List<Ingredient> ingredientList) throws com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvRequiredFieldEmptyException, com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvDataTypeMismatchException, FileNotFoundException
      Exports a list of Ingredient objects to a CSV file using OpenCSV.
      Parameters:
      ingredientList - the list of Ingredient objects to be exported
      Throws:
      com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvRequiredFieldEmptyException - if a required field is empty
      com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvDataTypeMismatchException - if a data type mismatch occurs during export
      FileNotFoundException - if the output file cannot be created

    • csvToIngredients

      public static List<Ingredient> csvToIngredients() throws IOException
      Imports a list of Ingredient objects from a CSV file using OpenCSV.
      Returns:
      a list of Ingredient objects imported from the CSV file
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while reading the file
